Symbol.Script_3D:
if gs_ventProfile_fill = 0 then gs_ventProfile_fill = SYMB_FILL if gs_ventProfile_pen_fg = 0 then gs_ventProfile_pen_fg = SYMB_FILL_PEN if gs_ventProfile_pen_bg = 0 then gs_ventProfile_pen_bg = SYMB_FBGD_PEN
material gs_ventProfile_mat pen gs_ventProfile_pen sect_fill gs_ventProfile_fill, gs_ventProfile_pen_bg, gs_ventProfile_pen_fg, gs_ventProfile_pen_cont
cprism_{2} gs_ventProfile_mat, gs_ventProfile_mat, gs_ventProfile_mat, 5, VentilationProfileThickness, -A/2, 0, 0, 15, gs_ventProfile_mat, -A/2, VentilationProfileHeight, 0, 15, gs_ventProfile_mat, A/2, VentilationProfileHeight, 0, 15, gs_ventProfile_mat, A/2, 0, 0, 15, gs_ventProfile_mat, -A/2, 0, 0, -1, gs_ventProfile_mat
if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then edgeStatus = 0 _thk = min(gs_frame_thk, VentilationProfileThickness)
plane_ 4, -A/2, 0, 0, edgeStatus, -A/2, 0, _thk, edgeStatus, A/2, 0, _thk, edgeStatus, A/2, 0, 0, edgeStatus
plane_ 4, -A/2, VentilationProfileHeight, 0, edgeStatus, -A/2, VentilationProfileHeight, _thk, edgeStatus, A/2, VentilationProfileHeight, _thk, edgeStatus, A/2, VentilationProfileHeight, 0, edgeStatus endif
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001
! iVentilationProfileType VENTPROFILE_OVER_FRAME = 2 VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING = 3
! iWindowType: WIN_W1 = 1 WIN_WDoubleSash = 2 WIN_W2 = 3 WIN_W2Sidelight = 4 WIN_W3 = 5 WIN_W32Sidelights1 = 6 WIN_W32Sidelights2 = 7 WIN_WVariable = 8 WIN_WVariableDoubleSash = 9 WIN_HistoricWindowSingle2 = 10 WIN_HistoricWindowSingle = 11 WIN_HistoricWindowDouble = 12 WIN_HistoricWindowTriple = 13 WIN_HistoricWindowSegmented = 14 WIN_HistoricWindowTripleArched = 15 WIN_W2HorizontalSlide = 16 WIN_W4HorizontalSlide = 17 WIN_Curved = 18 WIN_Bow = 19 WIN_SplayBay = 20 WIN_SquareBay = 21 WIN_Ribbon = 22 WIN_WSingleHung1 = 23 WIN_WSingleHung2 = 24 WIN_WSingleHung3 = 25 WIN_WDoubleHung1 = 26 WIN_WDoubleHung2 = 27 WIN_WDoubleHung3 = 28 WIN_WRound = 29 WIN_WOval = 30 WIN_WMultiside = 31 WIN_WHalfRound = 32 WIN_WQuarterRound = 33 WIN_WPentagon = 34 WIN_WTriangle = 35 WIN_WEyebrows = 36 WIN_WArched = 37 WIN_WTrapezoid = 38 WIN_WTrapezoidDoubleSash = 39 WIN_VentWindow = 40 WIN_2SashSliding = 41 WIN_MultisashHorizontal = 42 WIN_MultisashVertical = 43 WIN_GlassBlock = 44 WIN_TerraceDoorSWE = 45 WIN_W3HorizontalSlide = 46 WIN_W6HorizontalSlide = 47 WIN_VentilationBrick = 48 WIN_Rhomb = 49 WIN_Skewed = 50 DOOR_NoSidelight = 100 DOOR_OneSidelight = 101 DOOR_TwoSidelight = 102
! iMullionStyle MULLION_NONE = 1 MULLION_HVGRID = 2 MULLION_EDITABLEGRID = 3 MULLION_CUSTOM = 4 MULLION_PRAIRIE = 5 MULLION_DIVIDED = 6 MULLION_SOLID_GLAZED = 13 MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME = 14 MULLION_SOLID_PANEL = 15 MULLION_VENT_PANEL = 16
! ============================================================================= ! Localization ! =============================================================================
dim stVentilationProfileType[3] stVentilationProfileType[1] = `Нет` stVentilationProfileType[2] = `В Раме` stVentilationProfileType[3] = `В Остеклении`
if gs_VentilationProfileTypeEnable = 0 then bVentilationProfile = 0
if bVentilationProfile & (iVentilationProfileType = VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING) then dim sashID[10] for i = 1 to 10 sashID[i] = 0 next i
if iWindowType = WIN_MultisashHorizontal |\ iWindowType = WIN_MultisashVertical then
for i = 1 to 10 sashID[i] = CasementIDArray[1][i] * (i < (gs_panes_number + 1)) next i else if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W2HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then
if iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 1 sashID[2] = 2 sashID[3] = 3 sashID[4] = 5 sashID[5] = 4 sashID[6] = 6 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 3 sashID[2] = 1 sashID[3] = 2 sashID[4] = 4 sashID[5] = 7 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 3)) sashID[6] = 5 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 3 | iUTrans = 4)) sashID[7] = 6 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 2)) sashID[8] = 8 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 2 | iUTrans = 3)) endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 3 sashID[2] = 1 sashID[3] = 4 sashID[4] = 7 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 3)) sashID[5] = 5 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 3 | iUTrans = 4)) sashID[6] = 8 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 3)) endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W2HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 3 sashID[2] = 1 endif else if isWindow then sashID[1] = CasementIDArray[2][2] sashID[2] = CasementIDArray[2][3] * gs_bSLight sashID[3] = CasementIDArray[2][1] * gs_bLeftSLight sashID[4] = CasementIDArray[3][2] * gs_LTrans sashID[5] = CasementIDArray[3][3] * (gs_LTrans & gs_LTrans_Div) sashID[6] = CasementIDArray[3][1] * (gs_LTrans & gs_LTrans_Div) sashID[7] = CasementIDArray[1][2] * gs_UTrans sashID[8] = CasementIDArray[1][3] * (gs_UTrans & gs_UTrans_Div) sashID[9] = CasementIDArray[1][1] * (gs_UTrans & gs_UTrans_Div) sashID[10] = 0 else sashID[1] = CasementIDArray[2][2] sashID[2] = CasementIDArray[2][3] sashID[3] = CasementIDArray[2][1] sashID[4] = CasementIDArray[3][2] sashID[5] = CasementIDArray[3][3] sashID[6] = CasementIDArray[3][1] sashID[7] = CasementIDArray[1][2] * gs_UTrans sashID[8] = CasementIDArray[1][3] * gs_UTrans sashID[9] = CasementIDArray[1][1] * gs_UTrans sashID[10] = 0 endif endif endif
dim iMullionStyle[11] iMullionStyle[1] = iMullionStyle_01 iMullionStyle[2] = iMullionStyle_02 iMullionStyle[3] = iMullionStyle_03 iMullionStyle[4] = iMullionStyle_04 iMullionStyle[5] = iMullionStyle_05 iMullionStyle[6] = iMullionStyle_06 iMullionStyle[7] = iMullionStyle_07 iMullionStyle[8] = iMullionStyle_08 iMullionStyle[9] = iMullionStyle_09 iMullionStyle[10] = iMullionStyle_10 iMullionStyle[11] = iMullionStyle_11 endif
call "ventilation_paramhandling_m" parameters isWindow = isWindow, iWindowType = iWindowType, gs_bLeftSLight = gs_bLeftSLight, gs_bSLight = gs_bSLight, gs_UTrans = gs_UTrans, gs_UTrans_Div = gs_UTrans_Div, gs_LTrans = gs_LTrans, gs_LTrans_Div = gs_LTrans_Div, iUTrans = iUTrans, gs_panes_number = gs_panes_number, CasementIDArray = CasementIDArray, bVentilationProfile = bVentilationProfile, iVentilationProfileType = iVentilationProfileType, isVentilationProfileInSash_01 = isVentilationProfileInSash_01, isVentilationProfileInSash_02 = isVentilationProfileInSash_02, isVentilationProfileInSash_03 = isVentilationProfileInSash_03, isVentilationProfileInSash_04 = isVentilationProfileInSash_04, isVentilationProfileInSash_05 = isVentilationProfileInSash_05, isVentilationProfileInSash_06 = isVentilationProfileInSash_06, isVentilationProfileInSash_07 = isVentilationProfileInSash_07, isVentilationProfileInSash_08 = isVentilationProfileInSash_08, isVentilationProfileInSash_09 = isVentilationProfileInSash_09, isVentilationProfileInSash_10 = isVentilationProfileInSash_10, isVentilationProfileInSash_11 = isVentilationProfileInSash_11, iMullionStyle_01 = iMullionStyle_01, iMullionStyle_02 = iMullionStyle_02, iMullionStyle_03 = iMullionStyle_03, iMullionStyle_04 = iMullionStyle_04, iMullionStyle_05 = iMullionStyle_05, iMullionStyle_06 = iMullionStyle_06, iMullionStyle_07 = iMullionStyle_07, iMullionStyle_08 = iMullionStyle_08, iMullionStyle_09 = iMullionStyle_09, iMullionStyle_10 = iMullionStyle_10, iMullionStyle_11 = iMullionStyle_11, returned_parameters bFoundVentilationProfile, bFoundCustomMullion, bFoundVentPanelMullion
Symbol.Script_UI:
pageStartY = 3
stMainSash = `Основная Створка` stMainSash_1 = `Основная Створка 1` stMainSash_2 = `Основная Створка 2` stMainSashMiddle = `Основная Средняя` stMainSashSide_1 = `Основная Средняя 1` stMainSashSide_2 = `Основная Боковая 2` stSidelight = `Боковая Панель` stSidelight_1 = `Боковая Панель 1` stSidelight_2 = `Боковая Панель 2` stSidelightLower = `Нижняя Боковая Панель` stSidelight_1_Lower = `Нижняя Боковая Панель 1` stSidelight_2_Lower = `Нижняя Боковая Панель 2` stSideSash_1 = `Боковая Створка 1` stSideSash_2 = `Боковая Створка 2` stLowerSash = `Нижняя Створка` stLowerSash_1 = `Нижняя Створка 1` stLowerSash_2 = `Нижняя Створка 2` stLowerSashMiddle = `Нижняя Средняя` stLowerSashSide_1 = `Нижняя Боковая 1` stLowerSashSide_2 = `Нижняя Боковая 2` stTransom = `Фрамуга` stTransom_1 = `Фрамуга 1` stTransom_2 = `Фрамуга 2` stTransomSash = `Фрамуга` stTransomSash_1 = `Фрамуга 1` stTransomSash_2 = `Фрамуга 2` stTransomSashMiddle = `Средняя Фрамуга` stTransomSashSide_1 = `Боковая Фрамуга 1` stTransomSashSide_2 = `Боковая Фрамуга 2` stMainTransom = `Основная Фрамуга` stMiddleTransom = `Средняя Фрамуга` stSideTransom = `Боковая Фрамуга`
if bVentilationProfile & (iVentilationProfileType = VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING) then NAME_MAIN_SASH = "" NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = "" NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = "" NAME_LOWER_SASH = "" NAME_LOWER_SASH_1 = "" NAME_LOWER_SASH_2 = "" NAME_TRANSOM = "" NAME_TRANSOM_1 = "" NAME_TRANSOM_2 = ""
if iWindowType = WIN_W1 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSash NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WDoubleSash | iWindowType = WIN_W2 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash_2 NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSash_1 if gs_LTrans_Div then NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSash_2 else NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSash endif NAME_LOWER_SASH_1 = stLowerSash_1 if gs_UTrans_Div then NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash_2 else NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif NAME_TRANSOM_1 = stTransomSash_1 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W2Sidelight then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stSidelight NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSash NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W3 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSashMiddle NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSashSide_1 NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stMainSashSide_2 if gs_LTrans_Div then NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSashMiddle else NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSash endif NAME_LOWER_SASH_1 = stLowerSashSide_1 NAME_LOWER_SASH_2 = stLowerSashSide_2 if gs_UTrans_Div then NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSashMiddle else NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif NAME_TRANSOM_1 = stTransomSashSide_1 NAME_TRANSOM_2 = stTransomSashSide_2 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W32Sidelights1 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stSideSash_1 NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stSideSash_2 NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W32Sidelights2 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stSideSash_1 NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stSideSash_2 NAME_TRANSOM_1 = stTransomSash_1 NAME_TRANSOM_2 = stTransomSash_2 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WVariable then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSash NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stSidelight endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WVariableDoubleSash then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash_1 NAME_LOWER_SASH = stLowerSash NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stSidelight NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stMainSash_2 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowDouble then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash_2 NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSash_1 if gs_UTrans_Div then NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash_2 else NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif NAME_TRANSOM_1 = stTransomSash_1 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowSingle | iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowSingle2 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowTriple then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSashMiddle NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSashSide_1 NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stMainSashSide_2 if gs_UTrans_Div then NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSashMiddle else NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif NAME_TRANSOM_1 = stTransomSashSide_1 NAME_TRANSOM_2 = stTransomSashSide_2 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowTripleArched then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSashMiddle NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSashSide_1 NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stMainSashSide_2 NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowSegmented then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash_2 NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSash_1 NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WSingleHung1 |\ iWindowType = WIN_WDoubleHung1 |\ iWindowType = WIN_WRound |\ iWindowType = WIN_WOval |\ iWindowType = WIN_WMultiside |\ iWindowType = WIN_WPentagon |\ iWindowType = WIN_WTriangle |\ iWindowType = WIN_WEyebrows |\ iWindowType = WIN_WHalfRound |\ iWindowType = WIN_WQuarterRound |\ iWindowType = WIN_Rhomb then
NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WSingleHung2 | iWindowType = WIN_WDoubleHung2 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash_2 NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSash_1 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WSingleHung3 | iWindowType = WIN_WDoubleHung3 then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSashMiddle NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSashSide_1 NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stMainSashSide_2 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WArched |\ iWindowType = WIN_WTrapezoid then
NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = WIN_WTrapezoidDoubleSash then NAME_MAIN_SASH = stMainSash_2 NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stMainSash_1 NAME_TRANSOM = stTransomSash endif
if iWindowType = DOOR_NoSidelight then NAME_TRANSOM = stTransom endif
if iWindowType = DOOR_OneSidelight then NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stSidelight NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stSidelight if gs_UTrans_Div then NAME_TRANSOM = stMainTransom else NAME_TRANSOM = stTransom endif NAME_TRANSOM_2 = stSideTransom NAME_TRANSOM_1 = stSideTransom
NAME_LOWER_SASH_2 = stSidelightLower NAME_LOWER_SASH_1 = stSidelightLower endif
if iWindowType = DOOR_TwoSidelight then NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 = stSidelight_1 NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 = stSidelight_2 if gs_UTrans_Div then NAME_TRANSOM = stMiddleTransom else NAME_TRANSOM = stTransom endif NAME_TRANSOM_1 = stTransom_1 NAME_TRANSOM_2 = stTransom_2
NAME_LOWER_SASH_1 = stSidelight_1_Lower NAME_LOWER_SASH_2 = stSidelight_2_Lower endif
! It has to be consistent with the sashID array dim sashName[10] for i = 1 to 10 sashName[i] = "" next i
if iWindowType = WIN_MultisashHorizontal |\ iWindowType = WIN_MultisashVertical then
sashName[1] = `Створка 1` sashName[2] = `Створка 2` sashName[3] = `Створка 3` sashName[4] = `Створка 4` sashName[5] = `Створка 5` sashName[6] = `Створка 6` sashName[7] = `Створка 7` sashName[8] = `Створка 8` sashName[9] = `Створка 9` sashName[10] = `Створка 10` else if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W2HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then
if iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then sashName[1] = `Средняя Створка 1` sashName[2] = `Средняя Створка 2` sashName[3] = `Боковая Створка 1 / 1` sashName[4] = `Боковая Створка 1 / 2` sashName[5] = `Боковая Створка 2 / 1` sashName[6] = `Боковая Створка 2 / 2` endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide then sashName[1] = `Основная Створка 1` sashName[2] = `Основная Створка 2` sashName[3] = `Основная Створка 3` sashName[4] = `Основная Створка 4` if iUTrans = 1 then sashName[5] = `Фрамуга 1` sashName[6] = `Фрамуга 2` sashName[7] = `Створка Фрамуги 3` sashName[8] = `Створка Фрамуги 4` endif if iUTrans = 2 then sashName[7] = `Фрамуга 1` sashName[8] = `Фрамуга 2` endif if iUTrans = 3 then sashName[5] = `Фрамуга 1` sashName[6] = `Фрамуга 2` sashName[8] = `Створка Фрамуги 3` endif if iUTrans = 4 then sashName[6] = `Фрамуга 1` endif endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide then sashName[1] = `Основная Створка 1` sashName[2] = `Основная Створка 2` sashName[3] = `Основная Створка 3` if iUTrans = 3 then sashName[4] = `Фрамуга 1` sashName[5] = `Фрамуга 2` sashName[6] = `Створка Фрамуги 3` endif if iUTrans = 4 then sashName[5] = `Фрамуга 1` endif endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W2HorizontalSlide then sashName[1] = `Основная Створка 1` sashName[2] = `Основная Створка 2` endif else sashName[1] = NAME_MAIN_SASH sashName[2] = NAME_SIDELIGHT_1 sashName[3] = NAME_SIDELIGHT_2 sashName[4] = NAME_LOWER_SASH sashName[5] = NAME_LOWER_SASH_1 sashName[6] = NAME_LOWER_SASH_2 sashName[7] = NAME_TRANSOM sashName[8] = NAME_TRANSOM_1 sashName[9] = NAME_TRANSOM_2 endif endif
dim sashShowingOrder[10] if iWindowType = WIN_WDoubleSash |\ iWindowType = WIN_W2 |\ iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowDouble |\ iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowSegmented |\ iWindowType = WIN_WSingleHung2 |\ iWindowType = WIN_WDoubleHung2 |\ iWindowType = WIN_WTrapezoidDoubleSash then
sashShowingOrder[1] = 2 sashShowingOrder[2] = 1 sashShowingOrder[3] = 3 sashShowingOrder[4] = 5 sashShowingOrder[5] = 4 sashShowingOrder[6] = 6 sashShowingOrder[7] = 8 sashShowingOrder[8] = 7 sashShowingOrder[9] = 9 sashShowingOrder[10] = 10 else if iWindowType = WIN_WVariableDoubleSash then sashShowingOrder[1] = 1 sashShowingOrder[2] = 3 sashShowingOrder[3] = 2 sashShowingOrder[4] = 4 sashShowingOrder[5] = 5 sashShowingOrder[6] = 6 sashShowingOrder[7] = 8 sashShowingOrder[8] = 7 sashShowingOrder[9] = 9 sashShowingOrder[10] = 10 else sashShowingOrder[1] = 1 sashShowingOrder[2] = 2 sashShowingOrder[3] = 3 sashShowingOrder[4] = 4 sashShowingOrder[5] = 5 sashShowingOrder[6] = 6 sashShowingOrder[7] = 7 sashShowingOrder[8] = 8 sashShowingOrder[9] = 9 sashShowingOrder[10] = 10 endif endif
dim sashInShowingOrderID[] dim sashInShowingOrderName[] for i = 1 to 10 j = sashShowingOrder[i] sashInShowingOrderID[i] = sashID[j] sashInShowingOrderName[i] = sashName[j] next i endif
ui_separator 0,pageStartY - 2, 444,pageStartY - 2
x1 = 2 x2 = 220 x3 = 230 x4 = 440 x5 = 110 cx = 105 sepx = 224 y = 7 + pageStartY
ui_style 0, 1 ui_infield{3} "bVentilationProfile", x1, y+4, x2-x1, 18, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Приточная Вентиляция`, 0, 1, `Приточная Вентиляция`, 1
ui_style 0, 0 if gs_VentilationProfileTypeEnable > 0 then ui_infield{3} "iVentilationProfileType", x3, y, x4-x3, 20, 8, "", 3, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 2, stVentilationProfileType[2], VENTPROFILE_OVER_FRAME, ! Over Frame 3, stVentilationProfileType[3], VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING ! Over Galzing endif
ui_separator 0, 36 + pageStartY, 444, 36 + pageStartY
y = 52 + pageStartY picx = 106 picy = 122 sepx = 224
if not(bVentilationProfile) then ui_pict 1, x1, y, picx, picy, 1 ! vent_none.png else if iVentilationProfileType = VENTPROFILE_OVER_FRAME then ui_pict 2, x1, y, picx, picy, 1 ! vent_over_frame.png
ui_infield "VentilationProfileThickness", x5, y+12, cx, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Клапана` ui_infield "VentilationProfileHeight", x5, y+40, cx, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Клапана` endif if iVentilationProfileType = VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING then ui_pict 3, x1, y, picx, picy, 1 ! vent_over_glazing.png
ui_infield "VentilationProfileHeight", x5, y+63, cx, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Клапана`
ui_separator sepx, 40 + pageStartY, sepx, 230 + pageStartY
y = 40 + pageStartY dy = 18 ui_outfield `Створка Установки Клапана`, x3, y, x4-x3, 18, 0
y = y + dy for i = 1 to 10 if sashInShowingOrderID[i] > 0 then if sashInShowingOrderID[i] > 9 then param_name = "isVentilationProfileInSash_" + str((sashInShowingOrderID[i]), 2, 0) else param_name = "isVentilationProfileInSash_0" + str((sashInShowingOrderID[i]), 1, 0) endif
ui_infield{4} param_name, x3, y, x4-x3-2, 18, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, sashInShowingOrderName[i], 0, 1, sashInShowingOrderName[i], 1
y = y + dy endif next i
if bFoundCustomMullion | bFoundVentPanelMullion then ui_pict 4, 0, 210 + pageStartY, 12, 12, 1 ! ui_warningsign.png ui_outfield `Нельзя выбрать для специальной или вент. панели.`, 14, 208 + pageStartY, sepx-15, 35, 0 endif endif endif
if gs_VentilationProfileTypeEnable = 0 then ui_pict 4, 0, 202 + pageStartY, 12, 12, 1 ! ui_warningsign.png ui_outfield `Приточный клапан недоступен при отсутствии прямоугольных створок.`, 14, 202 + pageStartY, 420, 32, 0 endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
dim iVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[] dim sVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[]
i = 1
bFoundSelectedVentilationProfile = 0 if bittest(gs_VentilationProfileTypeEnable, 0) then ! Over Frame (2) iVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[i] = VENTPROFILE_OVER_FRAME sVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[i] = stVentilationProfileType[2]
if iVentilationProfileType = iVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[i] then bFoundSelectedVentilationProfile = 1 endif i = i + 1 endif if bittest(gs_VentilationProfileTypeEnable, 1) then ! Over Glazing (3) iVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[i] = VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING sVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[i] = stVentilationProfileType[3]
if iVentilationProfileType = iVentilationProfileTypeValueMask[i] then bFoundSelectedVentilationProfile = 1 endif i = i + 1 endif
if not(bFoundSelectedVentilationProfile) then ! Fallback to None bVentilationProfile = 0 parameters bVentilationProfile = bVentilationProfile endif
if gs_VentilationProfileTypeEnable = 0 then lock "bVentilationProfile" else values{2} "iVentilationProfileType" iVentilationProfileTypeValueMask, sVentilationProfileTypeValueMask endif
if not(bVentilationProfile) then lock "iVentilationProfileType", "VentilationProfileHeight", "VentilationProfileThickness", "gs_ventProfile_fill", "gs_ventProfile_pen_fg", "gs_ventProfile_pen_bg", "gs_ventProfile_mat", "gs_list_freeAirPerformance" hideparameter "iVentilationProfileType", "VentilationProfileHeight", "VentilationProfileThickness", "gs_ventProfile_fill", "gs_ventProfile_pen_fg", "gs_ventProfile_pen_bg", "gs_ventProfile_mat", "gs_list_freeAirPerformance" endif if bVentilationProfile & (iVentilationProfileType = VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING) then lock "VentilationProfileThickness" hideparameter "VentilationProfileThickness"
if not(bFoundVentilationProfile) then lock "VentilationProfileHeight", "gs_ventProfile_fill", "gs_ventProfile_pen_fg", "gs_ventProfile_pen_bg", "gs_ventProfile_mat", "gs_list_freeAirPerformance" hideparameter "VentilationProfileHeight", "gs_ventProfile_fill", "gs_ventProfile_pen_fg", "gs_ventProfile_pen_bg", "gs_ventProfile_mat", "gs_list_freeAirPerformance" endif
for CasementID = 1 to 11 bValidCasementToVentilation = 0 for i = 1 to 10 if sashID[i] = CasementID then bValidCasementToVentilation = 1 endif next i if (bValidCasementToVentilation) then if CasementID = 1 then if iMullionStyle[1] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[1] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_01 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_01 = isVentilationProfileInSash_01 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_01" endif endif if CasementID = 2 then if iMullionStyle[2] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[2] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_02 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_02 = isVentilationProfileInSash_02 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_02" endif endif if CasementID = 3 then if iMullionStyle[3] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[3] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_03 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_03 = isVentilationProfileInSash_03 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_03" endif endif if CasementID = 4 then if iMullionStyle[4] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[4] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_04 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_04 = isVentilationProfileInSash_04 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_04" endif endif if CasementID = 5 then if iMullionStyle[5] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[5] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_05 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_05 = isVentilationProfileInSash_05 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_05" endif endif if CasementID = 6 then if iMullionStyle[6] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[6] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_06 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_06 = isVentilationProfileInSash_06 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_06" endif endif if CasementID = 7 then if iMullionStyle[7] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[7] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_07 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_07 = isVentilationProfileInSash_07 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_07" endif endif if CasementID = 8 then if iMullionStyle[8] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[8] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_08 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_08 = isVentilationProfileInSash_08 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_08" endif endif if CasementID = 9 then if iMullionStyle[9] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[9] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_09 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_09 = isVentilationProfileInSash_09 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_09" endif endif if CasementID = 10 then if iMullionStyle[10] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[10] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_10 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_10 = isVentilationProfileInSash_10 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_10" endif endif if CasementID = 11 then if iMullionStyle[11] = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle[11] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then isVentilationProfileInSash_11 = 0 parameters isVentilationProfileInSash_11 = isVentilationProfileInSash_11 lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_11" endif endif else if CasementID = 1 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_01" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_01" endif if CasementID = 2 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_02" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_02" endif if CasementID = 3 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_03" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_03" endif if CasementID = 4 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_04" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_04" endif if CasementID = 5 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_05" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_05" endif if CasementID = 6 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_06" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_06" endif if CasementID = 7 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_07" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_07" endif if CasementID = 8 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_08" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_08" endif if CasementID = 9 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_09" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_09" endif if CasementID = 10 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_10" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_10" endif if CasementID = 11 then lock "isVentilationProfileInSash_11" hideparameter "isVentilationProfileInSash_11" endif endif next CasementID else if bittest(gs_VentilationProfileTypeEnable, 1) then ! Over Glazing (3) lock "gs_select_sash_vent_profile" hideparameter "gs_select_sash_vent_profile" endif endif

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"
